So you wanna farm

Greater Shadow Protection Potions ?

Find herbs , hate kingsblood .

but how? and y tho

You'll need to make Shadow Oil .


Shadow Oil

=

Fadeleaf x 4

Grave Moss x 4

Leaded Vial x 1

Once you've created shadow oil, you can make Greater Shadow Protection Potions

Greater Shadow Protection Potion

=

Shadow Oil x 1

Dreamfoil x 4

Crystal Vial x 1





Herb Calculator

In the scarlet monastery graveyard, three herbs are guaranteed to spawn. They can be the chad grave moss or the virgin kingsblood.
Click on how many grave moss spawned, and how many you got
